requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 2070
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR, requiere mandos con sensor de movimiento. Compatibilidad con HTC Vive y Oculus Rift.

results.name: Leo lost his mom - A narrative told in three forms
